description.en: The inspiration of Bitcoiin2Gen was to make a superior and more advanced version of Original Bitcoin. Therefore, Bitcoiin2Gen proposed a self-sustaining cryptocurrency, which is transforming the cryptocurrency world by creating a digital ecosystem. Bitcoiin’s self-sustaining ecosystem is an open, collaborative environment of a cryptocurrency (B2G), mining ecosystem (Dragon Mining Tech), and a crypto-wallet (B2G wallet). B2G is addressing the current issues that are slowing down the Bitcoin eco-system, longer transactions time, higher transactions fees, fewer earnings to miners, outreach from the ordinary people and most important its core system, the blockchain itself.
